body.name: 70mai True 4K Dash Cam A800S with Sony IMX415, Front and Rear, Free 128GB SD Card, Built in GPS, Super Night Vision, 3'' IPS LCD, Parking Mode, ADAS, Loop Recording, iOS/Android App Control
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 40 mins
features: 【Excellent 4K Ultra HD Dual Camera】70mai flagship camera 4K A800S with 70mai 1080P RC06 rear camera can achieve dual-vision recording which allows you to capture both the road ahead of you and behind, adding another pair of eyes on the road so you can drive without fear. Install the rear camera easily without connecting cables or plugging in ports

【Powerful Night Vision】4K dash cam A800S delivers excellent low-light performance that exceeds the traditional 3.3x. With 3D DNR (Dynamic Noise Reduction) technology and full 7-Glass/F1.8 aperture lens, the camera minimizes image noise. A dash cam that can be used with confidence at any time of the day or in certain weather conditions

【24-Hour Parking Surveillance】Keep monitoring when you leave your car, the G-sensor automatically detects sudden shakes or collisions and starts recording, providing critical evidence for every important moment for 24h. In the event of an accident, you'll receive a notification to check the event footage in the 70mai app. 70mai Hardwire Kit UP02 (B08R5SBKZR, not included) is required for parking mode

【ADAS System Featured Dash Cam】The Advanced Driving-Assistance System (ADAS) detects your surroundings and has real-time voice alerts to warn you of safety problems. The camera automatically detects lane markings and gives voice alerts when the car is drifting out of the lane. The dash cam also identifies the vehicle ahead and calculates the speed and distance of the car in front to prevent forward collisions while driving

【Built-in GPS & Route Tracking】 Equipped with built-in GPS, 70mai 4K A800S monitors and displays real-time trip data including time, speed, and coordinates. Tracks the exact location of an accident if one should occur, crucial for roadside assistance and insurance claims (Kind Reminder: All customer data are only saved locally. 70mai will not breach your data or private information for business purposes or any other intentions.)

【In-app Control & Footage Sharing】Sharing is not a problem anymore with the dash cam 4K A800S, the 70mai App supports both iOS & Android systems, allowing you to view and download videos via Wi-Fi hotspot connection. In case of an accident, you can simply share the footage with your insurance provider for a more efficient claims process. Also, this function enables you to achieve continuous OTA updates by automatically fixing bugs and updating software

【Seamless Loop Recording】The 4K dash cam A800S overwrites the oldest videos with new content when the SD card is full, so the dash cam can achieve continues recording. You can change the video file length from 1,2,3min by settings. This cam supports microSD cards with a minimum capacity of 32GB and a read/write speed of U1(UHS-1) and above

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT PRODUCT AT A REASONABLE PRICE
reviews.reviewText: Installation of the front camera, rear camera and hardwire kit in a RAM 3500 crew cab pickup took about 3 hours. All of the supplied cables were more than long enough to use in a vehicle that size. Getting the cameras up and running after installation was really straightforward. The picture quality, day and night, is excellent and I would buy the 70mai A800S again. That said, nothing is perfect and so I found things that need to be improved. #1 on the improvement list is the setup instructions. During setup the user is given several options. For instance, options for video length and options for how long the camera stays on when you exit the vehicle, however, the instructions give no information to help the user decide why you may want to choose one option over another for your particular situation/needs. #2 on the improvement list is the 70mai app. The app does allow you to connect to the A800S internal WiFi and it does a good job of allowing you to view video saved on the SD card. The issue I have with the app is that it takes way too many keystrokes to be able to view a saved video. It seems that every user command input simply brings up another warning window that the user has to clear to finally arrive at being able to view the saved video. A little information about video playback. On my first attempts to view recorded video from the SD card, both on my iPhone XR and on my laptop, the video quality was lacking. The video had a somewhat 'liquid' look to it, a sort of motion blur. The quality was good enough to show what happened leading to a traffic incident, but impossible to get any detail like a license plate number or road signs. I replaced the SD card with no improvement so I actually thought the camera was defective and requested a replacement from Amazon. Before the replacement arrived I found the answer to getting clean, crisp video from the SD card. I downloaded a VLC media player to my laptop and when I played the saved SD card camera video using the VLC player, BINGO, clear crisp HD video! I have now purchased a Lightning to SD card reader from Apple (about $30 on Amazon) and downloaded the VLC media player to my iPhone and iPad. If I want or need to view clear, crisp HD video I simply remove the SD card from the camera, insert in into the Apple card reader and play it through the VLC player on the phone or iPad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best way to protect yourself from insurance scams.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second camera I have owned from 70mai. The first being the pro. I had it for several years, and t still works. This is a major upgrade. The GPS is built into the camera instead of the mount and includes the rear camera. I had an issue with the GPS on the pro because of it being in the mount and having connection issues. I do not expect that issue with this model since it is built into the camera. However, the camera itself worked flawlessly for the 4 years I had it. I expect the same, and the rear camera is a must. I have already had a few close calls that were inches away from needing the footage from drivers trying to fly around me while I was merging. Do yourself a favor and buy one of these. I've seen them on sale here at times for $100, but even at full price, it is well worth it to protect yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, crisp and clear video even at night
reviews.reviewText: Rear camera could use an upgrade but it's good enough. Front camera is very good. Controls are easy to use, I love the form factor and the screen is angled good to be fully usable.One, well, two, issues, both with retrieving videos using my Galaxy phone:The card is not formatted in a standard FAT32 style, but close. Using a card reader, it is almost never properly seen when plugged into my phone, and when plugging it into my PC I have to re-plug it two or three times before it'll be seen as a usable card. And attempting to use wifi to download to the phone absolutely failed several times yesterday (fortunately, it was only for something I was interested in seeing rather than something I needed to save).No battery or super-capacitor, it turns off within seconds of losing power so if you want to keep recording when stopped, leave the engine running or hardwire it. And turn off the parking detection as that will turn it off a few minutes after it detects no movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Install took me maybe an hour. Setup was quite easy on the camera. Do wish when you connected to your phone you could do it all there...no biggie. Emergency recorded is a bit touchy, hit a a bump recording started. Easy to fix I just went into settings and turned off. So far everything seems pretty nice. Might have to buy another one for the wifes car. Over all seems quite nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Great features
reviews.reviewText: Simple set up. Great features. Very sensitive emergency detectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No customer support for this camera.
reviews.reviewText: Getting it on and off the mount is incredibly annoying. Once you adhere the mount to the windshield it cannot be repositioned or removed. It keeps going into emergency recording mode every time I hit a bump in the road and actually tells you it is doing so, which is annoying. And while it is in this mode you cannot do anything else. The worst part of all is you cannot get any help. The "manual" is quite brief and the app is not helpful with installation either. Definitely will be sending back ASAP

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The video quality is good and you're able to see people's license plates. It was quite easy to install and wasn't a hassle to figure out. So far everything is going great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente produto, fácil de instalar e ótimas imagens.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente produto, fácil de instalar e ótimas imagens. Muito recomendável.

reviews.reviewTitle: high-quality dash cam with good night vision.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the 70mai A800S for about two months now, and I'm really impressed with it. The video quality is amazing, especially in low light. I've been able to record clear footage of accidents and other incidents that happened at night.The app is also pretty easy to use. I can easily view my footage on my phone, and I can also download it if I need to. The app also has a built-in editor, so I can trim and edit my footage before sharing it.The only downside is that the rear camera is not 4K, but it's still good enough for my needs. I mostly use the rear camera to record traffic behind me, and it's more than capable of doing that.Overall, I'm really happy with the 70mai A800S. It's a great dash cam for the price, and it's definitely worth considering if you're looking for a high-quality dash cam with good night vision.
It’s good quality and I have used the old same model which broke after one year when warranty was finished. I hope this will last longer.
Melhor do que imaginei, muito bom o produto
